title: purivAi un pEraruLai
sahitya:
purivAi un pEraruLai murugA ippEdaikkum sharaNam ena unadaDi sErumpOdu uDanE


anupallavi

  tirunAmam unadai nAn dinamtOrum inimEl maravAdu karuduvEn peru vAzhvinaip-peravE


caraNam    Eru mayil mEl amarndu arupaDai vIDirundu Ariru karamonril vIra vaDivEl piDittu
sIruDaiya padam unadai sEra varum aDiyAr kOrum varam edaiyum koDuttu varumaiyE
